gui.boss_checklist.not_defeated: Boss not yet defeated in world.
gui.boss_checklist.server_warning: Make sure the mod is also installed on the server, otherwise this checkbox will not change.
gui.boss_checklist.info_frostmaw: The music disc only drops if the boss is killed during a snowfall and you take the Ice Crystal from his hands.
gui.boss_checklist.info_sculptor: To obtain the Gauntlet, you must pass his test.
gui.boss_checklist.info_chesed: It is recommended to study a more detailed description in the arena.
gui.boss_checklist.info_malkuth: It is recommended to study a more detailed description in the arena.
gui.boss_checklist.info_fairkeeper_boros: The drop depends on which boss you killed last.
gui.boss_checklist.info_fairkeeper_ouros: The drop depends on which boss you killed last.
boss_checklist.summon.wither: Crafted with §14 Soul Sand§r§0 and §13 Wither Skulls§r§0.
boss_checklist.summon.ender_dragon: Spawns on the central island of The End.
boss_checklist.summon.dead_king: Find it in the Catacombs, where the Wayward Compass points.
boss_checklist.summon.fire_boss: Use the Cinderous Soulcaller in the Citadel found via the Ancient Map in the Nether.
boss_checklist.summon.endstone_golem: Place §1Dragon's Breath§r§0 on the Golem Altar at the top of the tower in The End.
boss_checklist.summon.captain_cornelia: Can be summoned using the Shell Horn, which can be found on the Ship.
boss_checklist.summon.lord_pumpkinhead: Right-click on the Infernal Evil Pumpkin using Transmuting Elixir.
boss_checklist.summon.concierge: Complete all Mine Cells challenges and fight the boss in the Black Bridge dimension.
boss_checklist.summon.conjunctivius: Get the Vine Rune in the Promenade of The Condemned, then return to the Prison and find a place to use the Rune. (I couldn't replicate this in-game, so I copied it from the wiki.)
boss_checklist.summon.infernal_dragon: Find the tall tower in the Overworld with the boss at the top.
boss_checklist.summon.underworld_knight: Find the boss arena in the Nether.
boss_checklist.summon.yeti: Encounter a bone-strewn icy peak in a snowy plain.
boss_checklist.summon.sandworm: Look for suspicious ruins with bones in the desert.
boss_checklist.summon.obsidilith: Insert §1Eye of Ender§r into the Obsidian Altar atop the giant floating structure in the End.
boss_checklist.summon.gauntlet: Find the boss arena in the Nether lava pools.
boss_checklist.summon.lich: Find the Lich's Tower using a Soul Star, a low chance drop from undead. Summoning the boss requires §14 Soul Stars§r.
boss_checklist.summon.void_blossom: Find him deep in the caves by planting a Void lily that will point in the direction of the boss.
boss_checklist.summon.ancient_remnant: Find the sleeping boss in the Cursed Pyramid using the Eye of Desert and use the §1Necklace of the desert§r§0 obtained from suspicious sand.
boss_checklist.summon.netherite_monstros: Follow the Eye of Monstrous to the Soul blacksmith in the Nether.
boss_checklist.summon.the_harbinger: Find the Ancient factory using the Eye of Mech and use the §1Nether Star§r§0 to awaken the boss.
boss_checklist.summon.the_leviathan: Place the §1Abyssal Offering§r§0 at the Deep Altar in the Sunken City, which the Eye of Abyss will show you the way to.
boss_checklist.summon.scylla: Click the anchor at the top of the Acropolis, which can be found with the Eye of Storm in the Overworld.
boss_checklist.summon.maledictus: Click the Cursed Tombstone behind the Door of Seal, opened with the §1Strange Key§r§0, in the Frosted Prison, which the Eye of Curse will show you the way to.
boss_checklist.summon.ender_guardian: Follow the Eye of Void to the Shattered Citadel in the End.
boss_checklist.summon.ignis: Find the Burnung Arena with the Eye of Flame, defeat the Flame Revenants, and right-click the Fire Altar with the §1Burning Ash§r.
boss_checklist.summon.malkuth: Find the boss arena using the Eye of Malkuth. Study his description (in the arena) carefully before the fight.
boss_checklist.summon.chesed: Find the boss arena using the Eye of Chesed. Study his description (in the arena) carefully before the fight.
boss_checklist.summon.sculptor: Appears in the center of the Monastery.
boss_checklist.summon.ferrous_wroughtnau: Find him in the Wrought Chamber underground.
boss_checklist.summon.frostmaw: Spawns in snowy biomes such as Snowy Plains or Ice Peaks.
boss_checklist.summon.draugr_boss: Spawning in the Old Champion's Graves.
boss_checklist.summon.night_shade: Аppears after killing The Old Champion's Remains.
boss_checklist.summon.returning_knight: Use the Lost Soul on the Old Moon Altar.
boss_checklist.summon.accursed_lord_boss: Find the Decaying Kingdom in the Nether.
boss_checklist.summon.day_stalker: Use Chaos Orb during the day.
boss_checklist.summon.night_prowler: Use Chaos Orb during the night.
boss_checklist.summon.chaos_monarch: Use the Shard of Uncertainty (dropped by the Wither) on the Blackstone Pedestal.
boss_checklist.summon.moonknight: Use the Essence of Eventide on the Old Moon Altar.
boss_checklist.summon.corpse_warlock: Find him at the Blood Altar in the Nether.
boss_checklist.summon.nameless_guardian: Find a deep underground structure and descend to its very bottom, passing several tests.
boss_checklist.summon.ah_puch: Break the Ah Puch Idol in the Death Crypt.
boss_checklist.summon.kukulkan: Break the Kukulkan Idol in the Overgrown Temple.
boss_checklist.summon.void_worm: Throw the Mysterious Worm into the void of the End.
boss_checklist.summon.luxtructosaurus: Throw the Ominous Catalyst onto an active Volcanic Core.
boss_checklist.summon.wither_storm: Complete the wither form in the ruined structure in the center of the world.
boss_checklist.summon.withered_symbiont: Appears during phase 4 of the Wither Storm.
boss_checklist.summon.chaos_spawner: Use the Skull of Chaos to awaken the sealed boss in the deep dungeon.
boss_checklist.summon.fairkeeper_boros: Use the Redstone Idol in the center of the deep jungle dungeon. (Summoned along with Fairkeeper Ouros)
boss_checklist.summon.fairkeeper_ouros: Use the Redstone Idol in the center of the deep jungle dungeon. (Summoned along with Fairkeeper Boros)
boss_checklist.summon.aerwhale_king: Click on the Songstone at the top of the Platinum Dungeon.
